contact.defaultMessage:
Hello,

I am writing to you because a manager wants to meet with me / met with me today.

Date: {{date}}
Time: {{time}}
Manager: [name]
Stated Subject: [subject]

I would like to be accompanied by the union or get advice.

Thank you.

emergency.title: Before entering the office
emergency.right1: You have the right to be accompanied by the union.
emergency.right2: You can ask to postpone the meeting if no union representative is available.
emergency.right3: You are not obliged to sign a document on the spot.
emergency.right4: You have the right to take notes during the meeting.
emergency.right5: You can ask for a copy of any document concerning you.

rights.section1Text1: You have the right to be accompanied by a union representative during any meeting that could lead to disciplinary or administrative action. This is a fundamental right.
rights.section1Text2: If no union person is available immediately, you can ask to postpone the meeting to a time when someone from the union can accompany you.
rights.section2Text: You are not obliged to accept a meeting on the spot. You can ask for a reasonable delay to:
rights.bullet1: Prepare your version of the facts
rights.bullet3: Ensure the presence of a union person
rights.section3Text1: If you are presented with a document (warning, disciplinary measure, improvement plan), you are not obliged to sign it on the spot.
rights.section3Text2: You can ask for a copy, take the time to read it carefully, and consult the union before deciding whether to sign it or not. Your signature does not necessarily mean you agree with the content.
rights.section4Text1: Never hesitate to contact Local 10008. It is there to help and defend you.
rights.section4Text2: Don't wait for a situation to become critical. The union can help you as soon as a problem starts.

list: I wish to be accompanied by a union representative for this meeting.

I want to speak to my union before answering.
I do not feel comfortable continuing without union representation.

I would like to take notes during this meeting.
